name: Sprout (itch) (assertchris)
description:
I'm making a casual farming + order management sim, and I thought it would be interesting to put this up as a place to host short updates and give people the ability to try early access builds.

The ETA for this game is the end of March 2021.

Planned support:

  • Windows
  • Linux
  • Android
  • macOS
  • iOS
